title: Call for Papers
content: This year we are looking for sessions to fill our 3 tracks. The Drupal track will cover Drupal as a content service. The JavaScript track will cover modern JavaScript and its use in decoupled Drupal architectures. Finally the Future track will concern experimental approaches and emerging technologies. The deadline for all session submissions is Friday, June 8th at 11:59pm EST

title: Early bird Tickets
content: There are a limited amount of Early Bird Tickets available right now. Get yours before the price goes up.
